# The sysvshm extension

Configure the `sysvshm` extension.

This extension provides the System V shared memory support.

## EXT_SYSVSHM

* Default: `OFF`
* Values: `ON|OFF`

Enable the extension.

## EXT_SYSVSHM_SHARED

* Default: `OFF`
* Values: `ON|OFF`

Build extension as shared.
